author: ugo
msg: Retain ending slash in uriPrefix in method createResource.
This allows it to work with Apache2+mod_dav which apparently doesn't like a directory name without an ending slash.

author: pier
msg: Added XHTMLEncoder to encode HTML character references and HTMLEncoder to
handle the small (but vital) ' difference from XML documents.
Fixed XML/XHTML/HTMLSerializer(s) to handle the different encodings.
